original_text: Not many days later, the younger son gathered all he had and took a journey into a far country, and there he squandered his property in reckless living.
korean_text: 그 후 며칠이 안 되어 둘째 아들이 재물을 다 모아 가지고 먼 나라에 가 거기서 허랑방탕하여 그 재산을 낭비하더니

sentences.original_text: the younger son gathered all he had
sentences.korean_translation: 둘째 아들이 자기의 모든 재산을 모아

sentences.original_text: and took a journey into a far country
and there he squandered his property in reckless living.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 방탕하게 살며 자기 재산을 탕진했습니다
